message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not quite there yet. $850,000 is a bit too low for me, considering the value this product brings to you. I'm willing to come down to $900,000. I believe this is a fair compromise that benefits both of us.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $875,000 for the product. I think this is a reasonable compromise that works for both of us.
